dc:title: Master Line List of bangalore covid 19 patients

columns.name: Sl. No
columns.dc:description: Serial number of the record

columns.name: State Patient ID
columns.dc:description: ID of the covid-19 positive patient maintained by the State of Karnataka

columns.name: Age
columns.dc:description: Age of the covid-19 positive patient

columns.name: Age group
columns.dc:description: Age group to which the covid positive patient belongs to

columns.name: Gender
columns.dc:description: Gender of the covid positive patient

columns.name: RESIDENTIAL ZONES
columns.dc:description: The residential area to which the covid positive patient belongs to

columns.name: Ward Number
columns.dc:description: Ward number of the residential zone

columns.name: Ward Name
columns.dc:description: Specific name of the ward

columns.name: District
columns.dc:description: The district name to which the ward belongs

columns.name: Hospitalization at
columns.dc:description: The hospital where the covid positive patient was admitted

columns.name: HOSPITAL ZONES
columns.dc:description: The zone to which the hospital belongs to

columns.name: Date of Hospitalization
columns.dc:description: The date on which the covid positive patient was admitted to the hospital

columns.name: Date of sample collection
columns.dc:description: Date on which samples from the covid positive patient was collected for testing

columns.name: name of the testing lab
columns.dc:description: The lab where the samples collected from the covid positive patient were tested

columns.name: Result
columns.dc:description: Result of the covid-19 test

columns.name: Date of identification
columns.dc:description: Date on which the patient was diagnosed as covid positive

columns.name: Isolation days
columns.dc:description: Number of days the patient was isolated

columns.name: Transmission Type
columns.dc:description: How the patient came in contact with the virus

columns.name: Travel History/ name of Country/City
columns.dc:description: Details of travel to the affected country or details of contact with another covid positive patient

columns.name: Date of travel
columns.dc:description: Date on which the patient travelled to the said country

columns.name: Date of arrival to India
columns.dc:description: Date on which the patient arrived in India

columns.name: Current Status
columns.dc:description: Current status of the patient

columns.name: Discharge/Death date
columns.dc:description: Date on which the patient was discharged or died
